title: Review: Mophie brings MagSafe to a foldable and flexible stand for your iPhone
content:
Launched alongside its fantastic 3-in-1 travel charger, the mophie magnetic portable stand is made for MagSafe and fully foldable making it convenient to use almost anywhere. Follow along for a detailed look at this handy dual-hinged iPhone stand.

The post Review: Mophie brings MagSafe to a foldable and flexible stand for your iPhone appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The mophie magnetic portable stand offers MagSafe compatibility for iPhone along with a dual-hinge, fully folding design.
